titles.title: Prison Security Enhancement Act of 1999

To amend title 18, United States Code, to prohibit strength increasing equipment in Federal prisons and to prevent Federal prisoners from engaging in activities designed to increase fighting ability while in prison.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 10/21/1999--Introduced. Prison Security Enhancement Act of 1999 - Amends the Federal criminal code to direct the Bureau of Prisons to take care that: (1) all equipment designed to increase the physical strength or fighting ability of prisoners under its jurisdiction is removed from Federal correctional facilities; and (2) prisoners under its jurisdiction do not engage in any activities designed to increase their fighting ability.
